alert.note: Alert for Walker; Winston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 7:53PM CDT until August 05 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Walker County in central Alabama... Winston County in northwestern Alabama... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 752 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ashridge to Nauvoo, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jasper, Arley, Double Springs, Addison, Curry, Houston Recreational Area, Camp McDowell, Smith Dam, Nesmith, Brushy Lake, Poplar Springs, Falls City, Moreland, Smith Lake, Helicon, Inmanfield, Sardis, Corinth Rec Area, Winston Free State Barn and Houston. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
